column4: there was a traffic accident on National Road 4
column5: between KM 170-171.------An unnamed 28-Year-old Chinese man from Sihanoukville managed to take his souped up Tacoma off-roader off road
column6: and rolled it.------The car was driving to Phnom Penh
column7: and was travelling at high speed before the accident. Nobody was reported injured.
